headline: 1 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Dividend Stock to Buy Right Now
summary: Warren Buffett invests in companies that he believes are well run.  Berkshire holding Chevron offers an attractive dividend yield and has proven adept at surviving the oil industry's ups and downs.  Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B), the conglomerate led by renowned investor Warren Buffett, owns stakes in two large oil companies, Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY) and Chevron (NYSE: CVX).
